int32_t gaia::core::RestoreSession::restoreAll ( int64_t  token,
const RestoreObserver &  observer 
)

Restore the given set onto the device, replacing the current data of any app contained in the restore set with the data previously backed up.

Parameters:
tokenThe token corresponding to the restore set that should be used.
observerCallback object for receiving progress reports during a restore operation.
Returns:
Zero on success; nonzero on error.The observer will only receive progress callbacks if this method returned zero.
